title: Eco Luxury near Gir Forest with Daily Dining
description: Treat yourself to boutique luxury on an eco escape at the edge of Gir Forest, in the only place where majestic Asiatic Lions are seen in the wild: Woods at Sasan. This sprawling resort, built amidst an eight-acre mango orchard, is perfect for couples and families alike. Relax and unwind on a memorable and relaxing escape, and indulge with daily buffet breakfast, nightly dinner and one 30-minute massage per adult per stay at the blissful onsite spa.
offer_address: Gir Forest,India, Sasan-Talala Hwy, Sasan, Gujarat 362135, India
